original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī araññe viharati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmai udāyī araññe viharati

original: Tassāyasmato vihāro abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko.
analyzed: tassa ayasmataḥ vihāraḥ abhirūpaḥ hoti dassanīyaḥ pāsādiko

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā itthiyo ārāmaṁ āgamaṁsu vihārapekkhikāyo.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulāḥ itthiyaḥ ārāmam āgamasu vihāra pekkhikāyaḥ

original: Atha kho tā itthiyo yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: atha kho tāḥ itthiyaḥ yena ayasmai udāyī tena upasaṅkamisu
icchāma maya bhante ayyassa vihāram pekkhitunti

original: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī tā itthiyo vihāraṁ pekkhāpetvā tāsaṁ itthīnaṁ vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai udāyī tāḥ itthiyaḥ vihāram pekkhāpetvā tāsam itthīnam vaccamaggam

original: ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati yācatipi āyācatipi pucchatipi paṭipucchatipi
analyzed: ādissa vaṇṇam pi bhaṇati avaṇṇam pi bhaṇati yācati āyācati pucchati pi paṭipucchati pi
ācikkhati pi anusāsati pi akkosati pi

original: Yā tā itthiyo chinnikā dhuttikā ahirikāyo tā āyasmatā udāyinā saddhiṁ uhasantipi ullapantipi ujjagghantipi uppaṇḍentipi.
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ itthiyaḥ chinnikāḥ dhuttikāḥ ahirikāyaḥ tāḥ āyasmatā udāyinā saddhim uhasanti pi ullapanti pi ujjagghanti pi uppaṇḍenti pi

original: Yā pana tā itthiyo hirimanā tā nikkhamitvā bhikkhū ujjhāpenti—
analyzed: yāḥ pana tāḥ itthiyaḥ hiri manā tāḥ nikkhamitvā bhikkhū ujjhāpenti

original: Sāmikenapi mayaṁ evaṁ vuttā na iccheyyāma, kiṁ panāyyena udāyinā”ti.
analyzed: sāmikena api mayam evam vuttāḥ na iccheyyāma kim panāyyena udāyinā iti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā udāyī mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsissatī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmai udāyī mātugāmam duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsissati iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam udāyim aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ paṭipucchi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe bhikkhu saṅgham sannipātāpetvā āyasmantam udāyim paṭipucchi

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, udāyi, mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsasī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tvam udāyi mātugāmam duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsasi iti

original: “ananucchavikaṁ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
analyzed: ananucchavika moghapurisa ananulomikam appatirūpam a sāmaṇakam a kappiyam a karaṇīya

original: Kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsissasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa mātugāmam duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsissasi

original: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sarāgāya …pe…
analyzed: nanu mayā moghapurisa aneka pariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sa rāgāya pe
neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāseyya yathā taṁ yuvā yuvatiṁ methunupasaṁhitāhi, saṅghādiseso”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu otiṇṇaḥ vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmam duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāseyya yathā tam yuvā yuvatim methun upasahitāhi saṅgha ādisesaḥ ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: rattampi cittaṁ vipariṇataṁ, duṭṭhampi cittaṁ vipariṇataṁ mūḷhampi cittaṁ vipariṇataṁ.
analyzed: rattam api cittam vipariṇata duṭṭham api cittam vipariṇatam mūḷham api cittam vipariṇata

original: Api ca rattaṁ cittaṁ imasmiṁ atthe adhippetaṁ vipariṇatanti.
analyzed: api ca rattam cittam imasmin atthe adhippetam vipariṇatanti

original: manussitthī, na yakkhī, na petī, na tiracchānagatā. Viññū paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitaṁ duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṁ ājānituṁ.
analyzed: manussitthī na yakkhī na petī na tiracchānagatā viññū paṭibalā subhāsita dubbhāsitam duṭṭhulla aduṭṭhullam ājānitu
vācā vaccamagga passāva magga methuna dhamma ppaṭisayuttā vācā

original: daharo dahariṁ, taruṇo taruṇiṁ, kāmabhogī kāmabhoginiṁ.
analyzed: daharaḥ dahari taruṇaḥ taruṇi kāma bhogī kāma bhogini
pe tena api vuccati saṅgha ādiseso ti

original: Dve magge ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati, avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, yācatipi, āyācatipi, pucchatipi, paṭipucchatipi, ācikkhatipi, anusāsatipi, akkosatipi.
analyzed: dve magge ādissa vaṇṇam pi bhaṇati avaṇṇam pi bhaṇati yācati pi āyācati pucchati pi paṭipucchati pi ācikkhati pi anusāsati pi akkosati pi
dehi me a rahasi me dātunti
kadā su khaṇaḥ su layaḥ su muhuttaḥ bhavissati
kadā te methunam dhammam labhissāmi iti

original: puṭṭho bhaṇati— “evaṁ dehi. Evaṁ dentā sāmikassa piyā bhavissati manāpā cā”ti.
analyzed: puṭṭhaḥ bhaṇati evam dehi evam dentā sāmikassa piyā bhavissati manāpā ca ati

original: apuṭṭho bhaṇati— “evaṁ dehi. Evaṁ dentā sāmikassa piyā bhavissati manāpā cā”ti.
analyzed: a puṭṭhaḥ bhaṇati evam dehi evam dentā sāmikassa piyā bhavissati manāpā ca ati

original: Itthī ca hoti itthisaññī sāratto ca.
analyzed: itthī ca hoti itthi saññī sārattaḥ ca

original: Bhikkhu ca naṁ itthiyā vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi
analyzed: bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā vaccamaggam passa avamaggam ādissa vaṇṇam pi bhaṇati a vaṇṇam pi

original: bhaṇati yācatipi āyācatipi pucchatipi paṭipucchatipi ācikkhatipi anusāsatipi akkosatipi,
analyzed: bhaṇati yācati pi āyācati pucchati pi paṭipucchati pi ācikkhati anusāsati pi akkosati pi

analyzed: dve itthiyaḥ dvinnam itthīnam itthi saññī sārattaḥ ca

analyzed: bhikkhu ca nam dvinnam itthīnam vaccamaggam passāvamaggam ādissa vaṇṇam pi bhaṇati avaṇṇam pi bhaṇati pe

analyzed: itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnam itthi saññī sārattaḥ ca

original: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṁ itthiṁ etadavoca—

original: Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi “bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ, kacci nu kho ahaṁ saṅghādisesaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno”ti?
analyzed: tassa kukkuccam ahosi bhagavatā sikkhāpadam paññatta kacci nu kho aham saṅgha ādisesam āpattim āpanno ti

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kharakambalaṁ pārutā hoti.

original: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṁ itthiṁ etadavoca—

original: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṁ itthiṁ etadavoca—

original: Api ca yaṁ sāmikassa desi taṁ nāmhākaṁ desī”ti.

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kammaṁ karoti.
